content: If you extend an extension (I'm needing to add 'datum' to geocode - http://hl7.org/fhir/extension-geolocation.html - does the canonical url change? I'm assuming it does, but would like to confirm...
That would be a modifier extension, and I would expect break many implementations using a different coordinate system.
@Brian Postlethwaite - given that (apparently) we use a different one in NZ then I guess a specific extension will be required...
Yup, a different extension for your datum geocode. This would also be required for conversion with the boundary extension in location, and the near search param and contains.
(or you could map to the same coordinate system)
